Class StraightTrackFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.recon.tracking.straighttracks.StraightTrackFinder

  • public class StraightTrackFinder
extends Object
    Find straight tracks in 0-bfield copied/modified from org.lcsim.recon.tracking.SeedTrackFinder
